message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $900000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $750000.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that price.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $750000. I understand that it's a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to consider it. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $825000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's unique features and rarity.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $825000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go to $800000.  This is a fair price considering my initial offer and your previous counter. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
